verses.verse: Then Moab <S%H4124><s%> rebelled <S%H6586><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Ahab. <S%H256><s%>

And Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> down through <S%H1157><s%> a lattice <S%H7639><s%> in his upper <S%H5944><s%> chamber <S%H5944><s%> that was in Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> and was sick: <S%H2470><s%> and he sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers, <S%H4397><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, Go, <S%H3212><s%> inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Baalzebub <S%H1176><s%> the god <S%H430><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%> whether <S%H518><s%> I shall recover <S%H2421><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> disease. <S%H2483><s%>

But the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to Elijah <S%H452><s%> the Tishbite, <S%H8664><s%> Arise, <S%H6965><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up to meet <S%H7125><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> and say <S%H1696><s%> to them, Is it not because there is not a God <S%H430><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that you go <S%H1980><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Baalzebub <S%H1176><s%> the god <S%H430><s%> of Ekron? <S%H6138><s%>

Now therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> You shall not come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from that bed <S%H4296><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> you are gone <S%H5927><s%> up, but shall surely <S%H3588><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%> And Elijah <S%H452><s%> departed. <S%H3212><s%>

And when the messengers <S%H4397><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> to him, he said <S%H559><s%> to them, Why <S%H4100><s%> are you now <S%H2088><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> back? <S%H7725><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> to him, There came <S%H5927><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> up to meet <S%H7125><s%> us, and said <S%H559><s%> to us, Go, <S%H3212><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> that sent <S%H7971><s%> you, and say <S%H1696><s%> to him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Is it not because there is not a God <S%H430><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that you send <S%H7971><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Baalzebub <S%H1176><s%> the god <S%H430><s%> of Ekron? <S%H6138><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> you shall not come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from that bed <S%H4296><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> you are gone <S%H5927><s%> up, but shall surely <S%H3588><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%>

And he said <S%H1696><s%> to them, What <S%H4100><s%> manner <S%H4941><s%> of man <S%H376><s%> was he which <S%H834><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up to meet <S%H7125><s%> you, and told <S%H1696><s%> you these <S%H428><s%> words? <S%H1697><s%>

And they answered <S%H559><s%> him, He was an hairy <S%H1167><s%> <S%H8181><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> and girt <S%H247><s%> with a girdle <S%H232><s%> of leather <S%H5785><s%> about his loins. <S%H4975><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> It is Elijah <S%H452><s%> the Tishbite. <S%H8664><s%>

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to him a captain <S%H8269><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> with his fifty. <S%H2572><s%> And he went <S%H5927><s%> up to him: and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> he sat <S%H3427><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the top <S%H7218><s%> of an hill. <S%H2022><s%> And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him, You man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> has said, <S%H1696><s%> Come <S%H3381><s%> down. <S%H3381><s%>

And Elijah <S%H452><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H1696><s%> to the captain <S%H8269><s%> of fifty, <S%H2572><s%> If <S%H518><s%> I be a man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> then let fire <S%H784><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and consume <S%H398><s%> you and your fifty. <S%H2572><s%> And there came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and consumed <S%H398><s%> him and his fifty. <S%H2572><s%>

Again <S%H7725><s%> also he sent <S%H7971><s%> to him another <S%H312><s%> captain <S%H8269><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> with his fifty. <S%H2572><s%> And he answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H1696><s%> to him, O man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> has the king <S%H4428><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> quickly. <S%H4120><s%>

And Elijah <S%H452><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H1696><s%> to them, If <S%H518><s%> I be a man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> let fire <S%H784><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and consume <S%H398><s%> you and your fifty. <S%H2572><s%> And the fire <S%H784><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and consumed <S%H398><s%> him and his fifty. <S%H2572><s%>

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> a captain <S%H8269><s%> of the third <S%H7992><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> with his fifty. <S%H2572><s%> And the third <S%H7992><s%> captain <S%H8269><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up, and came <S%H935><s%> and fell <S%H3766><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his knees <S%H1290><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> Elijah, <S%H452><s%> and sought <S%H2603><s%> him, and said <S%H1696><s%> to him, O man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, let my life, <S%H5315><s%> and the life <S%H5315><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> your servants, <S%H5650><s%> be precious <S%H3365><s%> in your sight. <S%H5869><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came <S%H3381><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and burnt <S%H398><s%> up the two <S%H8147><s%> captains <S%H8269><s%> of the former <S%H7223><s%> fifties <S%H2572><s%> with their fifties: <S%H2572><s%> therefore let my life <S%H5315><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> be precious <S%H3365><s%> in your sight. <S%H5869><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to Elijah, <S%H452><s%> Go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> with him: be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> of him. And he arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> with him to the king. <S%H4428><s%>

And he said <S%H1696><s%> to him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> For as much <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> as you have sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Baalzebub <S%H1176><s%> the god <S%H430><s%> of Ekron, <S%H6138><s%> is it not because there is no <S%H369><s%> God <S%H430><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of his word? <S%H1697><s%> therefore you shall not come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> off that bed <S%H4296><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> you are gone <S%H5927><s%> up, but shall surely <S%H3588><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%>

So he died <S%H4191><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Elijah <S%H452><s%> had spoken. <S%H1696><s%> And Jehoram <S%H3088><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead <S%H8478><s%> in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Jehoram <S%H3088><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

Now the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the acts <S%H1697><s%> of Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he did, <S%H6213><s%> are they not written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%>
